originalText.text:
Dr. Falchi made the most uncomfortable conversation of my life as comfortable as can be imagined. His precision in explaining and caring was unlike anything I've ever experienced.

He took his time to explain everything to my GF and I. I wholeheartedly look forward to experiencing Dr. Falchi's care throughout this journey I am about to embark on and have nothing but faith in him üôè.

originalText.text: MSK is wonderful! Dr Lorenzo Falchi is such a caring, kind,intelligent. professional oncologist! I recommend anyone diagnosed with Lymphoma to make an appointment with this amazing doctor!! He saved my husband‚Äôs life!

text.text: MSK is wonderful! Dr Lorenzo Falchi is such a caring, kind,intelligent. professional oncologist! I recommend anyone diagnosed with Lymphoma to make an appointment with this amazing doctor!! He saved my husband‚Äôs life!

originalText.text: Dr Falchi helped my husband and I get through the most challenging time of our lives. He explained all procedures, test results, and medical plans and we never felt rushed.  A huge thank you to dr Falchi and his entire team!

text.text: Dr Falchi helped my husband and I get through the most challenging time of our lives. He explained all procedures, test results, and medical plans and we never felt rushed.  A huge thank you to dr Falchi and his entire team!

originalText.text: Dr. Falchi is a treasure like none other.  He is completely knowledgable, and communicates with clarity and compassion at all times.  If there is a finer Oncologist anywhere, I can't imagine who it would be!

text.text: Dr. Falchi is a treasure like none other.  He is completely knowledgable, and communicates with clarity and compassion at all times.  If there is a finer Oncologist anywhere, I can't imagine who it would be!

originalText.text: I saw Dr Falchi today. He answered every question I would ask before I asked them. Kevin was incredible as was the entire staff.
